summary:
!!! Warning !!!
Upon impact it may get rid of who you are looking at! It\'ll knock them miles away!
This blade does no damage, and is non-hostile. NPCs will not enter combat if you attack them.

This blade blows away anyone you strike.
descriptionHtml:
!!! Warning !!!
Upon impact it may get rid of who you are looking at! It\'ll knock them miles away!


Adds \"Waterlogged Chest\" in Riften, just below the Ratway, under the docks in the water.

This blade weighs nothing and is super fast.

This blade does no damage, and is non-hostile. NPCs will not enter combat if you attack them.

This blade blows away anyone you strike.

The Steam-friendly version is located here:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90889466

Thanks goes to http://www.youtube.com/user/IAmPattyJack for making this awesome video:

 [youtube]oAGILsBxoWw[/youtube]
author: Aderic
